name: Idle Matcher
description:
Idle Matcher is a fun casual matching game with a twist, matching cards gains you points which can be used to unlock a ton of upgrades and even additional decks to match. Upgrades increase match points, deck clearing multipliers, timer bonuses, and special computer played auto decks. You can even prestige to start from scratch with a multiplier on your score!

NOTE this release is the upcoming INDIE BUNDLE FOR ABORTION FUNDS, I expect linux and OSX builds to be ready my mid week
